posts.post_content:
Hey everyone. I saw alot of these posts when I started coming on this forum and never thought I'd be here but I am selling off most of my collection of T206 cards and newspaper ads to pay down my honeymoon. Its sad but a reality.
So I can be reached at [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]. My name is Doug. This will be the first of a few posts. I'm hoping to sell to you guys rather then go on eBay but if you want to check me out I'm Brass2384 on eBay w. 100% rating. I will accept paypal for items.
 Prices are negotiable
Here is what I have to offer:
T206 Graded

Ray Demmitt New York VG-EX4 PSA Piedmont 350 back $65.00
Bill Clymer GOOD 2 PSA American Beauty back ******SOLD******
Rube Geyer VG 3 PSA Sovereign back ******SOLD******
Phil Poland EX 5 PSA Piedmont 350 back (ghost image) $90.00
Christy Mathewson Portrait VG-EX4 PSA Piedmont 150 back *****SOLD******
